Hi, all.

There's a 3-year-old request to update the JUnit javadoc so that the
junit.framework classes are included (and properly marked as deprecated).
 Is there anyone out there that would have the time and energy to take this
on?

https://github.com/KentBeck/junit/issues/81

Thanks,

   David Saff
